content.rendered:
Directed by Hiphop Tamizha Adhi.

Written by Hiphop Tamizha Adhi.

Cast Aathmika(Nila). Ma ka Pa Anand(RJ at Mirchi FM).Thameem Ansari. Sundar C.(Cameo appearance). Gajaraj(Nila’s uncle). Vinoth Gd(Sudhakar).Gopi. Jeeva(Shravan).Hari Hara Krishna. Manisha Malavika(Nila’s friend). Krishnakumar Menon(School Principal). Fenny Oliver(Ram). Guhan Prakash(Arun). Sha Ra(Balaji). Ananth Ram(Adhi’s brother).Sudhakar. Anbu Thasan(Sanjay). R.J. Vignesh(Jeeva). Vijayalakshmi(Adhi’s mother). Pradeep K Vijayan(Marshal). Vishal(Cameo appearance). Vivek(Ramachandran) . (0)

Language Tamil.

Producers Sundar C.. Anbu Raja.

Production Avni Movies.
